report.dashboard.study.title: Study Assessments
report_msg_lo_default: {Name} is continuing to learn on KidsLoop. This week, {Name} achieved {AchievedLoCount} learning outcomes out of {LearntLoCount} from the class {ClassName}.
report_msg_LO_new: {Name} started learning on KidsLoop this week. So far, {Name} achieved {AchievedLoCount} learning outcomes out of {LearntLoCount} from the class {ClassName}.
report_msg_lo_increase_previous_w: In class {ClassName}, {Name} has achieved {LOCompareLastWeek}% more learning outcomes compared to the previous week.
report_msg_lo_decrease_previous_w: In class {ClassName}, {Name} has achieved {LOCompareLastWeek}% less learning outcomes compared to the previous week.
report_msg_lo_increase_previous_large_w: In class {ClassName}, {Name} has achieved {LOCompareLastWeek}% more learning outcomes compared to the previous week. Give {name} a big high-five for a job well done!
report_msg_lo_decrease_previous_large_w: In class {ClassName}, {Name} has achieved {LOCompareLastWeek}% less learning outcomes compare to the previous week. It might be time to check in with {name}.
report_msg_lo_increase_3w: In class {ClassName}, {Name} achieved more learning outcomes in the last 3 consecutive weeks. In total, {Name} achieved {LOCompareLast3Week}% more learning outcomes as compared to 3 weeks ago.
report_msg_lo_decrease_3w: In class {ClassName}, {Name} achieved fewer learning outcomes in the last 3 consecutive weeks. In total, {Name} achieved {LOCompareLast3Week}% less learning outcomes as compared to 3 weeks ago.
report_msg_lo_high_class_w: This week, {Name} has achieved {LOCompareClass}% more learning outcomes than the class {ClassName} average.
report_msg_lo_low_class_w: This week, {Name} has achieved {LOCompareClass}% less learning outcomes than the class {ClassName} average.
report_msg_lo_high_class_3w: During these past 3 consecutive weeks, {Name} has achieved {LOCompareClass3week}% more learning outcomes than the class {ClassName} average.
report_msg_lo_low_class_3w: During these past 3 consecutive weeks, {Name} has achieved {LOCompareClass3week}% less learning outcomes than the class {ClassName} average.
report_msg_lo_high_class_review_w: This week, {Name} has achieved {LOReviewCompareClass}% more reviewed learning outcomes than the class {ClassName} average.
report_msg_LO_low_class_review_w: This week, {Name} has achieved {LOReviewCompareClass}% less reviewed learning outcomes than the class {ClassName} average.
report_msg_att_default: {Name} is continuing to learn on KidsLoop. This week, {Name} attended {AttendedCount} classes among {ScheduledCount} scheduled classes for the class {ClassName}.
report_msg_att_new: {Name} started learning on KidsLoop. So far, {Name} attended {AttendedCount} classes among {ScheduledCount} scheduled classes for the class {ClassName}.
report_msg_att_increase_previous_w: {Name} has attended {AttendCompareLastWeek}% more classes as compared to the previous week for the class {ClassName}.
report_msg_att_decrease_previous_w: {Name} has attended {AttendCompareLastWeek}% less classes as compared to the previous week for the class {ClassName}.
report_msg_att_increase_previous_large_w: For the class {ClassName}, {Name} has attended {AttendCompareLastWeek}% more classes as compared to the previous week. Tell {Name}, "Awesome job!"
report_msg_att_decrease_previous_large_w: For the class {ClassName}, {Name} has attended {AttendCompareLastWeek}% less classes as compared to the previous week. Please check if {name} has any problems with the learning environment.
report_msg_att_increase_3w: During these past 3 consecutive weeks, {Name} has attended {AttendCompareLast3Week}% more classes for the class {ClassName}.
report_msg_att_decrease_3w: During these past 3 consecutive weeks, {Name} has attended {AttendCompareLast3Week}% less classes for the class {ClassName}.
report_msg_att_high_class_w: This week, {Name} has attended {LOCompareClass}% more classes than the class {ClassName} average.
report_msg_att_low_class_w: This week, {Name} has attended {LOCompareClass}% less classes than the class {ClassName} average.
report_msg_att_high_class_3w: During these past 3 consecutive weeks, {Name} has attended {LOCompareClass3week}% more classes than the class {ClassName} average.
report_msg_att_low_class_3w: During these past 3 consecutive weeks, {Name} has attended {LOCompareClass3week}% less classes than the class {ClassName} average.
report_msg_assign_default: {Name} is continuing to learn on KidsLoop. This week, {Name} completed {AssignCompleteCount} assignments among {AssignmentCount} given assignments for the class {ClassName}.
report_msg_assign_new: {Name} started learning on KidsLoop. So far, {Name} completed {AssignmentCompleteCount} assignments among {AssignmentCount} given assignments for the class {ClassName}.
report_msg_assign_increase_previous_w: {Name} has completed {AssignCompareLastWeek}% more assignments as compared to the previous week for the class {ClassName}.
report_msg_assign_decrease_previous_w: {Name} has completed {AssignCompareLastWeek}% less assignments as compared to the previous week for the class {ClassName}.
report_msg_assign_increase_previous_larg: {Name} has completed {AssignCompareLastWeek}% more assignments as compared to the previous week for the class {ClassName}. Give {name} a big compliment!
report_msg_assign_decrease_previous_larg: {Name} has completed {AssignCompareLastWeek}% less assignments as compared to the previous week for the class {ClassName}. Please check if {name} needs more support.
report_msg_assign_increase_3w: During these past 3 consecutive weeks, {Name} has completed {AssignCompare3Week}% more assignments for the class {ClassName}.
report_msg_assign_decrease_3w: During these past 3 consecutive weeks, {Name} has completed {AssignCompare3Week}% less assignments for the class {ClassName}.
report_msg_assign_high_class_w: This week, {Name} has completed {AssignCompareClass}% more assignments than the class {ClassName} average.
report_msg_assign_low_class_w: This week, {Name} has completed {AssignCompareClass}% less assignments than the class {ClassName} average.
report_msg_assign_high_class_3w: During these past 3 consecutive weeks, {Name} has completed {AssignCompareClass3week}% more assignments than the class average for the class {ClassName}.
report_msg_assign_low_class_3w: During these past 3 consecutive weeks, {Name} has completed {AssignCompareClass3week}% less assignments than the class average for the class {ClassName}.
report_msg_no_data: There was no data to display in this week.
report_msg_lo_new: {Name} started learning on KidsLoop this week. So far, {Name} achieved {AchievedLoCount} learning outcomes out of {LearntLoCount}.
report_msg_lo_low_class_review_w: This week, {Name} has achieved {LOReviewCompareClass}% less reviewed learning outcomes than the class average.
